thread.title: Perfect location, zero hassle, good service experience.
thread.title_full: Perfect location, zero hassle, good service experience. - Review of Pullman London St Pancras Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Shane C
title: Perfect location, zero hassle, good service experience.
text:
Myself and my girlfriend stayed 3 nights here on the London leg of our vacation.
Excellent location just a short walk from London St Pancras rail and underground station, southern exit.
We arrived very early in the morning and thought we had little chance of being checked in. But the front desk staff were impeccably kind and professional. He very kindly negotiated with the housekeeping to have our room ready in just a few minutes. Thank you Alin!
It really made a huge difference to us and was a nice start to our stay.
Apart from that the hotel itself is nicely kitted out. We took basic room but it was amply sized, temperate, secure, well furnished, and equipped. No complaints at all. A very pleasant stay!
